description: This is a React functional component for a front-end page that manages registry entries. It includes components for listing registry providers, deleting entries, and adding or updating providers. It interacts with API functions to load and modify registry data, and uses common UI elements such as buttons, inputs, and feedback components.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads registry items from API, updating state with success or error message.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a registry provider after confirmation, updating UI accordingly.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves a new or updated registry provider via API, updating UI messages.
